tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Secrets
programme.desc: Admiral Chegwidden, Mac and Bud Roberts are taken hostage in the Admiral's office by Pvt. Magida, a Marine who escaped from a nearby Federal prison.

programme.title: JAG: Ghosts
programme.desc: Harm and Mac investigate an attempt on Admiral Chedwiggen's life and uncover the fact that all the members of his former SEAL team have died under mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: JAG: Full Engagement
programme.desc: While on their day off, Harm takes Mac for a flight in his vintage airplane, only to be forced to make an emergency landing in a mountain clearing because of mechanical problems.

programme.title: JAG: Cowboys and Cossaks
programme.desc: Harm, Mac, and Bud are assigned sea duty to monitor a joint war games exercise between U.S. and Russian naval forces.

programme.title: JAG: The Guardian
programme.desc: Harm and Mac defend Bauwer, a former Navy Seal, now a homeless man, who's accused of using excessive force when he killed three men who tried to hold up a convenience store.

programme.title: JAG: Rendevous
programme.desc: Mac and Harm once again find themselves courtroom adversaries as Mac is assigned the difficult task of defending CPO Holst, an admitted wife abuser accused of murdering his wife's boyfriend.

programme.title: JAG: Vanished
programme.desc: Concerns regarding the mysterious disappearance of a fully armed Navy F-14 during a storm lead Harm's investigation to consider such diverse scenarios as pilot suicide, terrorism, the Bermuda Triangle curse, or UFO interference.

programme.title: JAG: King of the Fleas
programme.desc: Having just stabbed a man on a street-corner, Willie, a wheelchair-bound former Vietnam POW arrives at JAG headquarters to report "a 30-year-old murder" which he's just committed. Willie relates that while imprisoned he knew Harm's father.

programme.title: JAG: Against All Enemies
programme.desc: Harm, Mac and Bud board an aircraft carrier in the Sea of Japan to investigate the accidental shooting down of a North Korean civilian airliner by Navy jets.

programme.title: JAG: Impact
programme.desc: Harm and Bud investigate the crash of a Marine helicopter whose dead pilot is being blamed for the incident. They discover the chopper seems to have been hit by some form of UFO. Government security officials want to maintain a cover-up at all costs.

programme.title: JAG: People V. Rabb
programme.desc: Harm is arrested by the FBI for the murder of Konaplanik, a Russian who was selling Harm supposedly accurate information about his missing father's whereabouts. The killer turns out to be Col. Tomashevsky, a Russian agent.

programme.title: JAG: Defensless
programme.desc: A woman Navy ensign shoots and kills a Turkish colonel; she claims self-defense.

programme.title: JAG: With Intent to Die
programme.desc: With help from Harm, Mac, Harriet, and Bud, Admiral Chedwiggen investigates the apparent suicide of his mentor, Admiral Clancy, who allegedly shot himself while on a hunting trip. Harm and company ultimately uncover who the killer was.

programme.title: Scorpion: This Is The Pits
programme.desc: Walter must swim through the deadly La Brea Tar Pits when Team Scorpion helps a woman trapped in the tar before she runs out of oxygen.

programme.title: Scorpion: Wreck The Halls
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Team Scorpion's electronics-free mountain getaway turns deadly when they come across gun-runners, and Ralph is kidnapped when they try to escape.

programme.title: Scorpion: Ice Ca-Cabes
programme.desc: When a mission in the desert results in exploding shrapnel that seriously wounds Cabe, Team Scorpion must freeze his body in order to save his life.

programme.title: Scorpion: Faux Money Maux Problems
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion is duped into producing counterfeit money for a foreign entity intent on ruining the U.S. economy, Paige must rely on her mother Veronica's skills as a grifter to save them.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Hole Truth
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must save a man teetering on the edge of a massive sink hole that threatens to destroy the Los Angeles water supply forever.

programme.title: Scorpion: Sharknerdo
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's job to find sunken treasure goes awry when Walter and Paige's boat explodes, leaving them lost in the middle of the Pacific Ocean surrounded by sharks.

programme.title: Scorpion: Don't Burst My Bubble
programme.desc: Following a severe storm, Happy's friend Ada, who lives in a sterile bubble to protect her compromised immune system, is left with dangerous debris on the verge of puncturing the structure.

programme.title: Scorpion: Monkey See, Monkey Poo
programme.desc: To stop a dangerous virus from spreading, Team Scorpion must locate a rare endangered monkey in the Amazon that has the antibody for the cure.

programme.title: Scorpion: Broken Wind
programme.desc: While on a mission to repair a turbine at a wind farm, Team Scorpion must race to save Paige and Happy before the cable holding the gondola they are in snaps and sends them plummeting to the ground.

programme.title: Scorpion: Rock Block
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must defy the orders of a foreign government after they retrieve an asteroid from space containing DNA strands that could have deadly consequences once exposed.

programme.title: Scorpion: Strife on Mars
programme.desc: Team Scorpion gets trapped inside a failing and dangerous biodome designed for Mars while trying to extract a pair of scientists inside.

programme.title: Scorpion: Something Burrowed, Something Blew
programme.desc: Team Scorpion helps Toby and Happy race to the altar to say "I Do" after a simple job extinguishing a tunnel fire becomes catastrophic.

programme.title: Scorpion: Maroon 8
programme.desc: While en route to Toby and Happy's honeymoon, Team Scorpion's plane crash lands on a remote deserted island, leaving them all with little hope for rescue.

programme.title: Scorpion: Scorp Family Robinson
programme.desc: Three weeks after they crash land on a deserted island, tensions run high for Team Scorpion when they must battle to overcome their relationship obstacles with each other in order to be rescued.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Class Dismissed
programme.desc: As local high schools wind to a close for summer, dangerous pranks abound – including the theft of an armed police car. While tracking down the stolen vehicle, Andy and Swarek pick up the trail of a volatile teen boy.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Good Shoot
programme.desc: Dov Epstein happens upon a convenience store robbery-in-progress that results in him shooting a young black teenager.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Girl’s Night Out
programme.desc: On Traciʼs first day as a detective, all hell breaks loose when a carload of girls from a bachelorette party hits another vehicle, killing the driver. Jerry discovers that the driver of the parked car was dead before the accident.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Messy Houses
programme.desc: While answering a domestic disturbance call, Andyʼs personal life is turned inside out when the social worker on the scene turns out to be her estranged mother.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Coming Home
programme.desc: A noise complaint leads Andy and Swarek to an illegal warehouse party, and to an injured John Doe -- a homeless squatter whoʼs been stabbed in the warehouse.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: When a gifted psychic - or, at the very least, a gifted conman - enters 15 Division to help find the missing witness in an organized-crime case, the officers are forced to come face-to-face with some of the hidden truths.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Rules
programme.desc: Itʼs “back to basics” for 15 Division when Staff Sergeant Frank Best decides itʼs time for his officers to get back on track.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Every Man
programme.desc: A seasonʼs worth of trials and tribulations come to a head during a frenzied night at the station when the distracted rookies improperly search a prisoner.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: I Never
programme.desc: When a violent child abductor escapes from an emergency hospital visit, 15 Division goes on the hunt for the criminal -- only to discover that heʼs taken another young victim.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Surprises
programme.desc: After six months working undercover, Andy and Nick’s operation goes sideways when Nick, then Andy go missing. Meanwhile, a random arrest at 15 Division puts Sam Swarek and the other officers in the middle of the investigation-turned-rescue-mission.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Homecoming
programme.desc: On her first day back at 15 Division, Andy must work with Swarek to track down an ex convict determined to get his old life back at any cost. Andy realizes just how much has changed since she walked away from her old life six months ago.

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT2
programme.desc: The second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation at the now-abandoned old police station and courts in Accrington. With the team splitting up to cover as much space as they can, something seems to be stalking them.

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT3
programme.desc: The third and final part of this terrifying and intriguing investigation into the paranormal activity at Accrington’s Old Police Station and Courts.

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding is back with the first part of a brand-new episode of Most Haunted. The intrepid ghost hunter has taken her team to the historic hall, which is said to be haunted by ancestral ghosts, the apparition of a white lady and a demon dog.

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt2
programme.desc: Watch the second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation of a historic hall, where the paranormal activity includes the disembodied sounds of children laughing and crying and the apparition of a white lady.

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads her team in a two-part investigation at the foreboding Gloucester Prison, one of Britain's most haunted places, known for its history of death, fear, pain, suicide, and incarceration.

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt3
programme.desc: The third part of Yvette Fielding and the team's investigation into the very haunted and abandoned Gloucester Prison. With the team splitting up the activity rises and something is trying to stop Yvette and Glen.

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads team in a violent, secret investigation. Place's name and location concealed due to extreme haunting. Little history, aggressive entities a mystery. Can they reveal the darkness and face the unknown?

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT2
programme.desc: Most Haunted's deadliest investigation, Part 2. Spirits emerging, team's resolve tested as darkness envelops. Growing fear, team's safety at stake. Can they continue?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Armely Mills Cottage
programme.desc: The cottage on the site of Armley Mills is said to be full of paranormal activity so Karl decides to enter, alone and witnesses something that is eager to grab his attention.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Beaumanor Hall
programme.desc: Karl ventures, alone, to the upper floors of this large mansion and id stalked by something that wants to be heard.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall
programme.desc: Yvette takes Glen and Mary into the incredibly haunted Bishton Hall. They start in the upper floors and work their way down to the cellars, but is something following them.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P1
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house and seems to be pulled in different directions from an unexplained energy.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to King George, Virginia to become the first paranormal team to investigate Belle Grove Plantation.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Phantoms of the Opera
programme.desc: On this special Halloween episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Ohio to investigate the Cincinnati Music Hall, a buildingwhere the hauntingsare as frequent as the performances.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 4
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 8
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Serial Killer's Revenge
programme.desc: Jason and the TAPS team head to Charleston, South Carolina, one of the most haunted cities in America and winner of Ghost Hunters America's Hometown Ghost Hunt Contest.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Home Is Where the Haunt Is
programme.sub-title: Home Is Where the Haunt Is
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Taps heads to Beardslee Castle in Little Falls, NY, which is a hometurned into a restaurant/ bar that has lots of interesting claims.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Little Drummer Boy
programme.desc: TAPS has received an urgent call for help from a Chicago community center whose patrons are being chased away by a variety of menacing spirits.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Something in the Water
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Excelsior Springs, Missouri to investigate The Elms Resort & Spa.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 3
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 7
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Vault of the Heavens
programme.desc: Dylan hears voices beckoning him to a planet of "fire and ice.

programme.title: Andromeda: Deep Midnight's Voice
programme.desc: While caught in a battle between two Nietzschean prides, the crew captures a hostile who claims that his pride possesses a map of the slipstream.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Illusion of Majesty
programme.desc: A wrong turn after exiting a slipstream sends the Andromeda into the Prolon system. They rescue an escape pod from certain disaster, but the pride wants it back.

programme.title: Andromeda: Twilight of the Idols
programme.desc: The crew seeks for a lost colony of Nietzscheans and discovers another crew that has been secretly helping them.

programme.title: Andromeda: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.sub-title: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.desc: The crew installs a new AI in a new Commonwealth battleship, and naturally things don't go as they should.

programme.title: Andromeda: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.sub-title: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: Tyr convinces the Nietzscheans that he is the reincarnation of Drago Museveni.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double or Nothingness
programme.desc: Dylan is kidnapped by Nietscheans and forced to play mind games for the amusement of his captors.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Two Nietzschean siblings are in a stand-off over a weapon that can eliminate higher brain functions.

programme.title: Andromeda: Soon the Nearing Vortex
programme.desc: Tyr returns, having joined with the Collectors and demands the route of ages from his former crewmates.

programme.title: Andromeda: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.sub-title: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.desc: A hostage situation ensues when the crew confronts Tyr.

programme.title: Andromeda: Conduit to Destiny
programme.desc: A wrong turn in the slipstream leads Andromeda to a prison riot.

programme.title: Andromeda: Machinery of the Mind
programme.desc: The Andromeda crew steps up to find out who killed a group of scientists.

programme.title: Andromeda: Exalted Reason, Resplendent Daughter
programme.desc: The crew is hired to rescue a princess from a notorious outlaw, but it is soon revealed that she was trying to escape murder at her father's hand.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.186
programme.desc: A young man denies killing a teen's dog during their graduation party. Intoxicated teenagers prompt neighbors to call police, leading to a dispute over a broken apartment lease between feuding ex-roommates.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.241
programme.desc: A man describes his relationship as "friends with benefits" with a woman who claims she lent him money for living expenses. A woman sues her former live-in boyfriend for home renovation costs and furniture expenses.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.84
programme.desc: A contract between cousins to ‘share’ a Pontiac Grand Am ends with a fight over the return of the car with allegedly ‘missing’ speakers/A fight over a three-way gym membership leaves a young woman at odds with her ex-boyfriend and his best friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.178
programme.desc: Two women fight at a Halloween party over wearing the same costume, disputing their relationship with the Sheriff’s department. A woman crashes her co-worker's car into oncoming traffic, admitting she was driving without a license.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.218
programme.desc: A man is allegedly chased out of a bar and viciously attacked after being accused of stealing a woman’s purse.\t\t\t\r\nA man hits black ice and has a wreck in his brother’s ex-girlfriend’s car; she sues him for damages.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.137
programme.desc: Alleged assault, vandalism, and marijuana use are the source of\t\t\t\r\ncontention between a woman and her nephew’s ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.1
programme.desc: A month after meeting online, unwed parents decide to live together but then fight over cross-country moving expenses/Judge Judy asks if a man will remove and hand over one of his diamond earrings to pay a single mother back for an alleged loan.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.93
programme.desc: Man sues ex-girlfriend for car loan and carpet cleaner return; she alleges jealousy. Woman claims ex-lover's drug addiction led to eviction; he sues for furniture and electronic equipment return.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.79
programme.desc: A teenager puts his father in a choke-hold to demonstrate how he allegedly assaulted another boy at school who passed out cold and is suing for medical expenses/Two young women accuse an ex-friend of breaking their door down.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.234
programme.desc: A man's family visit turns sour as he and the child's mother argue over a hairbrush. High school friends living together feud over rent, bills, and a trip.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.162
programme.desc: Teen sues ex-friend for burns and stolen laptop, countersued for harassment. Adult entertainment sued for refund after male dancers disrupt birthday party.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.47
programme.desc: A woman’s finger is broken after an argument at a party over alleged cocaine use; she claims she was pushed down the stairs by her roommate/Arrested as a result of bouncing two checks, a man sues a former friend who gave them to him.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.131
programme.desc: Man sued by parents after second wife's mysterious death and $40,000 life insurance policy; alleged child abuse involved/Man calls cops to remove ex-girlfriend from apartment, sues her for rent after she leaves, fearing for his life.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.175
programme.desc: Man accused of cheating for 10 years alleges friend vandalized his car. Woman accused of violently kicking car while witnessing couple making out inside.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.99
programme.desc: Lawyer with 42 years clashes with Judge as ex-friends dispute Miami plane ticket cost/Repossessed car due to red light running, unauthorized driving, and missed payments.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.230
programme.desc: Judge Judy compares signatures on an allegedly forged contract between ex-friends who are fighting over expensive cosmetology classes.\t\t\t\r\nA 19-year-old girl is suing her ex-boyfriend for allegedly stealing her laptop computer.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.110
programme.desc: Custody of a beautiful, homemade baptismal gown is disputed by entranged family members/While driving with her five children in the car, a woman runs a red light, is arrested and is later sued by her uncle who claims he bailed her out.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.112
programme.desc: Young woman sues foster family over deleted files/Ex-lover sued for loan, truck damage, and impound fees from prison romance.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.142
programme.desc: Man sues mother of his child for selling his Baby Pac-Man game; she counters for harassment, alleging cheating. Man claims ex's obsession forced him to move; she sues for unpaid rent, electric bill.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.66
programme.desc: A woman and her niece wage war over impound fees on a Chevy Trailblazer, the cost of college tuition, and $92 dollars allegedly ‘stolen’ by a raccoon.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.160
programme.desc:
A karaoke business owner is suing his former employee for			
allegedly stealing a client and damaging his equipment.			
A $5,000 loan made from a cash advance on a credit card destroys			
a friendship.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.48
programme.desc: Man accused of punching lover, sued for allegedly stealing bill money due to gambling habit/Woman uses inheritance to aid brother, demands repayment; he alleges false arrest and refuses payment.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.14
programme.desc: Teenagers, romantically linked to the same man, bicker over backstabbing, an assault at a party, and car vandalism.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.53
programme.desc: A case of stolen identity and destroyed credit between sisters is\t\t\t\r\ndisputed/A potted plant falls off a balcony and hits a man in the head; he\t\t\t\r\nsues his neighbor for the cost of his medical bills.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.168
programme.desc: Woman allegedly destroys sister's TV after affair with ex-boyfriend revealed. Woman sues ex-boyfriend for instigating violence at house party brawl.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.5
programme.desc: Judge probes man giving ex's furniture to friend; ex had short move-out time/Woman blames ex's area for car theft, accuses him of negligence.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.206
programme.desc: Furniture left out in the snow, an alleged campaign to ruin an ex-\t\t\t\r\nlover’s reputation, and an alleged assault in a car come into play\t\t\t\r\nwhen ex-lovers who met online call it quits.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay makes a decision that changes the competition; two chefs work as servers during the dinner service; each team nominates two contestants to be put up for elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Martin Yan judges six Chinese dishes created by the remaining contestants; during dinner service, one team disappoints a VIP guest; a contestant is eliminated.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants enter an animal pen to determine which type of protein they will cook in the team challenge; during dinner service, the contestants must impress chef Ramsay's family.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must create five steak dishes; a diner finds an unpleasant surprise in her dish during dinner service; the elimination round brings out bad tempers.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of wannabe chefs through a series of gruelling challenges as they battle for the ultimate prize of a head chef position at his Las Vegas restaurant. The two teams are challenged to throw a party fit for a princess.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs compete to participate in a photo shoot and host a dinner for members of the Army.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the chefs' palates with a blind taste test; Ramsay presents an unexpected challenge in order to determine who gets immunnity.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chef with the best dish earns immunity; the chefs prepare a meal for TV host Maria Menounos and actor Jeremy Sisto; one team's service flags during dinner.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the contestants' ability to communicate and work together with a three entrée relay race, with the winners getting a helicopter tour and a caviar tasting.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon reunites the contenders with their loved ones before challenging them to jazz up some basic cuts of meat.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A team of previous winners returns to challenge the remaining contestants; each team designs its own menus for dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final five chefs must impress tough critics with a gourmet burger; a huge misstep brings dinner service to a halt; one chef is eliminated.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With the grand finale just around the corner, the remaining chefs are challenged to replicate a sample dish using taste, texture and sight alone. The winner is rewarded with a $1,000 shopping spree before another taxing evening service begins.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay presides over the penultimate episode of the US cooking competition as this year's explosive series nears its climax. Three contestants soon become two as Gordon names the second finalist.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Contact
programme.desc: The repo team is back! On the premiere episode of the summer season of Operation Repo, Lou, Matt, Sonia, Froy, and Lyndah are back together and better than ever...although a secret meeting suggests trouble in paradise. This week, the team confronts...

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Crush
programme.desc: Lou faces the toughest loss of his career. First, the team repossesses a truck from a pair of larger-than-life debtors with a passion for exotic sports, then they grapple with a gaggle of drunken partiers who don't want to give up their tricked-out bus.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Daddy's Little Girl
programme.desc: The destruction of the repo team's truck has left the future of the company in the balance, but Matt's got a trick up his sleeve that might keep them afloat. Lou and Sonia head to a dark alley to take a van away from a pair of libidinous teens.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Junior Partner
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hard Turns Ahead
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride, Matt and Lyndah attempt to repo..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: The confusion over Lou's new business relationship with Matt continues to mount. Matt and Froy find themselves in a nice neighborhood on a mission to repossess a security car from the world's most bumbling guards, Sonia, Lyndah, and Matt hit the docks.

programme.title: Operation Repo: New Truck Day
programme.desc: The repo team's new truck finally arrives, and with it, a new chapter in the building feud between Team Lou and Team Matt.

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Blow to the Head
programme.desc: When Froy is seriously injured on a routine repo, the building confrontation between Lou and Matt continues to escalate.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Burning Up
programme.desc: Lou's new business relationship with Matt starts to unravel when a botched job puts a serious strain on the company.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Getting the Axe
programme.desc: Tensions between Lou and Matt continue to boil when Matt enlists his daughter's aid on another job.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Harassment
programme.desc: A new employee with an axe to grind against Audrey files a sexual harassment claim against her. Meanwhile, after being teased for playing cricket, Timmy challenges Jeff to a game to prove the sport is not for wimps.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Surrogate
programme.desc: An overly enthusiastic Audrey pushes it too far with a surrogate mother who she and Jeff are considering paying to have their baby. Meanwhile, Russell shamelessly pokes fun at Jennifer and Adam's wedding Web site.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: They Do?
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer plan a secret wedding; however, a series of unfortunate events puts their plan in jeopardy. Meanwhile, to keep Russell and Timmy from finding out about the ceremony, Adam tells them he is staging an intervention for Jeff.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rug-of-War
programme.desc: Upset that he'll have to purchase a new rug after Audrey gives their old one to Adam and Jenn, Jeff tries to sabotage the gift by telling Adam about all the 'fun' that he and Audrey had on it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Bank
programme.desc: When Jeff screws up paying for Audrey's Pilates classes, he reveals to Adam that he has a 'Bank' of mistakes that she has incurred that he uses to ease her anger. Russell sends an email to Timmy's crush.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Surro-Gate
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey discover surprising news about their surrogate.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Handy Man
programme.desc: When Audrey realizes Jeff is getting a bit bored in the bedroom, she tries to spice it up. Russell gets called out on a business trip, but has a fear of flying. He invites Timmy to distract him.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Play Ball
programme.desc: Audrey considers quitting her job when she realizes it's making her life miserable. Although things are heated between Allison and Timmy, she wants to put their sex life aside so they can spend time getting to know each other.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baked
programme.desc: Audrey embarks on a new start after quitting her demanding job; however, her time at home makes her stir crazy, prompting her to start a cookie business. Timmy is getting advice from the guys who encourage him to be more of a dude than a gentleman.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Les-Bro
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey embark on finding a surrogate mother, only to run into problems with the interviewing process. Russell's wealthy mother comes to town, and he reluctantly decides to have her stop paying his rent.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mannequin Head Ball
programme.desc: Stuck with a store Jeff leased for Audrey's fleeting cookie shop, he and Adam stay behind to clean up and discover a new game using the heads of mannequins.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Singing and Dancing
programme.desc: When Timmy joins an a cappella group, he wants to keep it a secret from Russell. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey discover they have a new annoying neighbor.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Anniversary Chicken
programme.desc: When Jeff decides to surprise Audrey by remembering their anniversary, he's the one who ends up being surprised. Meanwhile, Timmy is forced to be Russell's interpreter on a date.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Day
programme.desc: When Jeff proclaims it's 'Jeff Day', he gets his way until the cleaning lady arrives. Meanwhile, Adam has to figure out why his eye is twitching.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Zygote
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey see a fertility specialist with their surrogate, they discover a zygote. Meanwhile, Russell and Timmy go on double dates again.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Set Up
programme.desc: When Russell discovers Timmy has a sister, he aims to impress her. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey set their neighbor Liz up on a date.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Beating the System
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey learn their surrogate is pregnant, both of their lives change. Meanwhile, Timmy takes on the responsibility of wedding planner for Adam and Jennifer.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Jeff Photo
programme.desc: When an old photo of Jeff appears in an art gallery, he decides it's time to make some changes in his life. Meanwhile, Russell experiences a slump with women until he sees a familiar face.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Power Couple
programme.desc: Jeff is threatened when Audrey gets a raise and makes almost as much as he does. Meanwhile, Russell enlists Timmy to find out what Liz sees in another man.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Double Down
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt, as suggested by Adam. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy’s help in finding it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.desc: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with 'red hot' ladies but instead, it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Jeff and Audrey settle an argument.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk
programme.desc: Russell tries to get out of his marriage to an overly enthused Liz, who tries to make it work, while Jeff attempts to engage Audrey in dirty talk.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.sub-title: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.desc: Dog launches a high stake hunt through the desolate and dangerous mountain landscape of western Colorado in pursuit of a gun-loving survivalist with a million dollar bond on his head. Will Dog's plan of using brains over brawn work?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: With a long record of violence and abuse and weighing in at over 200lbs, Dog's target for the day does not sound like a gentle giant. When the trail grows cold Dog turns up the heat on the fugitive's brother and sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: And Baby Makes Three
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Tender Trap
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tears for Fears
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Picture This
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.(n)

programme.title: Minotaur: Minotaur
programme.desc: When the villagers offer their brethren as a sacrifice to the Minotaur, Theo (Tom Hardy) sets off on a harrowing quest to the labyrinth to kill the evil bull-god.

programme.title: Rise Of The Fellowship
programme.desc: What if The Lord of the Rings wasn’t just a story? What if it happened to you? Randall Dooley and his friends are outcasts at school, spending most of their time playing online games. After Randall is set up for a crime he didn’t commit.

programme.title: Avengers Grimm: Time Wars
programme.desc: An Evil Queen enlists Rumpelstiltskin to help her send the Avengers Grimm back in time. The Avengers will need to work together if they are to return to the present and thwart the Queen before she can carry out her evil plan.

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.

programme.title: The Last Boy
programme.desc: The world at an end, a dying mother sends her young son on a journey to the place that grants wishes. A fantasy drama inspired by the works of the 13th Century Sufi Mystic and Poet Rumi.

programme.title: Native
programme.desc: Two scientists are selected to travel across the universe to the source of a distant transmission and potential life.

programme.title: Beyond the Law
programme.desc: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Follows the key people at an investment bank over a 24-hour period during the early stages of the 2008 financial crisis.

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.

programme.title: A Boy Called Sailboat
programme.desc: A small family finds hope in their extraordinary son named Sailboat when a personal gesture awakens a global desire.

programme.title: The Great Alaskan Race
programme.desc: In this incredible true story, widowed father Leonhard travels 700 miles across treacherous ice with only his sled dogs for company, to deliver the anti-toxin to the hospital, after a deadly diphtheria outbreak hits the small Alaskan town of Nome in 1925.

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.(n)

programme.title: Fist of Fury
programme.desc: A Bruce Lee Classic! Lee plays Chen Zhen, a student of Huo Yuanjia, who fights to defend the honor of the Chinese in the face of foreign aggression, and to bring to justice those responsible for his master's death.

programme.title: Cops and Robbers
programme.desc: A strung-out hostage negotiator plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse with a cornered bank robber who is hell-bent on getting out of the bank and humiliating the negotiator in the process.

programme.title: Crystal Skulls
programme.desc: It is 2020 and the apocalypse is inevitable. 12 of 13 Crystal skulls are united causing catastrophic events. Only the 13th Skull can theoretically restore order before the Earth is destroyed from within by their power.

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: A team of scientists are gathered to prevent a global catastrophe. But one of the scientists realizes early on that the cause of volcanic reactions is most likely due to a secret government operation investigating alternative energy resources.

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.sub-title: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.desc: Jack Hunter is abducted blindfolded to a Turkish US base to be recruited by the NSA, told his mentor was killed because Albert Littmann's Russian mob employer Doridanov want the ancient Osiris-weapon.

programme.title: Banana Joe: Banana Joe
programme.desc: A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.

programme.title: Chasing Christmas
programme.desc: A bitter and burned-out Ghost of Christmas Past decides to go AWOL.

programme.title: Megan's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: When Megan is taken away from the only life she’s ever known and moves to a small town in West Virginia, she struggles to fit in. She also gives up her one true passion, dancing. But the nativity at her local church might just turn her life around.

programme.title: A Very Corgi Christmas
programme.desc: Laura, a single mom meets a fellow single dad Ben, who enlists her help in taking care of a cute corgi puppy he plans to give to his daughter at Christmas. Through all the chaos, Lauren gets the chance to finally experience the holiday spirit.

programme.title: Holiday Wishes
programme.desc: Britney, a rich, spoiled child, and Rachel, an orphan, switch bodies after a visit to the mall with Santa Claus. Each girl wakes up as the other - Britney is in the orphanage, and Rachel is at Britney's family's mansion.

programme.title: Wish Upon A Christmas
programme.desc: When business executive Amelia returns home to help a family-run ornament company, the employees see her as their savior who is coming in to rescue the company.

programme.title: Sound Of Christmas
programme.desc: Whilst trying to reignite his daughter’s passion for Christmas, Brad, falls in love with piano teacher, Lizzie. However, their romance is threatened by Brad’s business interests.

programme.title: Holiday in Your Heart
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old LeAnn Rimes wants nothing more than to sing at the Grand Ole Opry. She is invited to sing at a Christmas concert on Nashville's famous stage, but upon her arrival, she is faced with a difficult decision.

programme.title: My Nanny's Secret
programme.desc: Starring Haylie Duff. When a home invasion robbery leaves one member of the wealthy Tyrell family dead, the family's live-in nanny, Claudia, begins to suspect that her troubled brother may be the culprit.

programme.title: My Son Is Innocent
programme.desc: After a brutal nighttime rape, police investigators zero in on teenager Eric Sutter. When the victim identifies Eric as her attacker, the legal system closes in on the boy as friends, neighbors and the media turn against him.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.desc: Having the winning lottery jackpot ticket is the best thing that could have happened to delivery man Bill Regan. Determined to find out what happened, a friend retraces Bill's delivery stops and discovers they lead to her own husband.

programme.title: Killer Infatuation
programme.desc: Mackenzie runs a killer-dedicated podcast with a large fan base. However, she begins living her own murder mystery, as she develops an infatuation with her impossibly attractive new neighbor, who was the prime suspect in a murder years ago.

programme.title: Twin Betrayal
programme.desc: Hoping for a fresh start, Julia, a troubled woman, moves to Los Angeles with her new boyfriend. After settling into a new home, mysterious things begin to happen. It's not long before Julia becomes convinced that her demons have moved with her.

programme.title: The Double
programme.desc: An edge-of-your-seat espionage thriller, starring Richard Gere and Topher Grace as ex-CIA and FBI agents, trying to find the killer of a US senator, which bears the hallmark of an infamous Soviet assassin, thought to be dead.

programme.title: Secret Liaison
programme.desc: One time top public defender returns to LA to try to stop her sister from going to jail for first degree murder, but Samantha also comes face to face with the past she ran away from.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Legendary half-demon Hellboy encounters an ancient resurrected sorceress who's out to avenge a past betrayal. Caught in a clash between the supernatural and the human, Hellboy becomes hell-bent on stopping her without triggering the end of the world.

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince.

programme.title: Beyond Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: The Sheriff of Nottingham uses a shape-shifting monster to destroy Robin Hood (Robin Dunne).

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: Exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules (Kellan Lutz) must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince.

programme.title: Beyond Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: The Sheriff of Nottingham uses a shape-shifting monster to destroy Robin Hood (Robin Dunne).

programme.title: The Changeover
programme.desc: A teen in Christchurch, New Zealand, battles an ancient spirit who slowly drains the life out of her 4-year-old brother.

programme.title: Red Sun: Red Sun
programme.desc: In 1870, a gang robs a train and steals a ceremonial Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. President, prompting a manhunt to retrieve it.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Hoss befriends a violent man after Adam and Little Joe warned him to stay away.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Adam tries to prove to Hoss his love interest is a Gambler only interested in his money.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Little Joe tries teaching a deaf girl sign language after seeing her get mistreated by her father.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The Cartwrights construct a grist mill to help neighbor Tom Edwards, a disabled man who blames Ben for his condition. Ezekiel, the hired hand is also cheating him out of his money.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leader’s daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The Cartwights become suspicious of a U.S. Deputy marshal, when they find out he is bringing their friend to town, as a witness to a racketeering trial.

programme.title: Switched
programme.desc: Tired of being bullied, Cassandra Evans prays that her nemesis, Katie Sharp, the queen bee of social media, would know what it's like to walk a day in her shoes. Her prayer is answered in an unexpected way when they get "Switched.

programme.title: Mark & Russell's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Mark is excited when the most popular girl in his class asks HIM to drive her to a party, except he doesn't have a license. With his popularity on the line and his best friend Russell in tow, Mark hits the road on a cross-town adventure.

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 1
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.

programme.title: Captain Sabertooth
programme.desc: The orphan boy Pinky follows the Captain on an exciting and dangerous journey across the big oceans to the kingdom of Lama Rama, hunting for a treasure and the answer to who is Pinky's father.

programme.title: Class Rank
programme.desc: Starring Olivia Holt (Cloak & Dagger), Skyler Gisondon (Booksmart) and Bruce Dern (The Senator). Two high school outsiders join forces to overtake the local school board.

programme.title: The Mighty Macs
programme.desc: In the early 70s, Cathy Rush becomes the head basketball coach at a tiny, all-girls Catholic college. Though her team has no gym and no uniforms Coach Rush looks to steer her girls to their first national championship.

programme.title: A Dog Named Duke
programme.desc: When a former soldier finds himself homeless, he decides the best thing to do for his sick dog (Duke) is to leave him on the steps of a local animal shelter. The dedicated staff nurse Duke back to health and then launch a campaign to locate his owner...(n)

programme.title: Blue Iguana
programme.desc: Ex-jailbirds Eddie and Paul are on parole and working in a New York diner. Their lives are a dead end. That is, until English lawyer Katherine Rookwood walks into the diner with an offer they can't refuse. Feat: Sam Rockwell.

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with her small-town misery after she discovers a roller derby league in nearby Austin.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George is a retired soccer pro whose glory days are behind him. Burnt out on his playboy lifestyle and bankrupted by a string of bad investments, he moves back to Virginia to reconnect with his estranged ex-wife and neglected son.

programme.title: Funny Money
programme.desc: When Henry Perkins accidentally trades his briefcase with a man, he finds five million dollars inside. However, the cash draws in Mr. Big, who wants to reclaim his money.

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: A lonely widow plans a trip around the world with her husband's ashes, to visit the places they loved in the movies. The first stop on the journey changes her life forever.

programme.title: Everyone Says I Love You
programme.desc: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a troubled marriage while her stepsister gets engaged. Starring: Woody Allen, Goldie Hawn, Julia Roberts, Edward Norton, Drew Barrymore, Natasha Lyonne, Natalie Portman.

programme.title: Death Line
programme.desc: The discovery of a dying man by two students at Russell Square tube station triggers a hunt for cannibals preying on passengers.

programme.title: The Beast Must Die
programme.desc: A wealthy hunter invites a group of people to his fortified mansion hoping to trap the werewolf among them.

programme.title: Penny and the Pownall Case
programme.desc: A glamour model helps Scotland Yard to catch a criminal gang.

programme.title: Behind the Headlines
programme.desc: When a blackmailing showgirl is murdered, reporters Pam Barnes and Paul Banner find themselves plunged into a twilight world of crime and conspiracy as they seek to track down the blonde schemer's killer.

programme.title: The Black Orchid
programme.desc: Romantic complications in the form of angry children threaten the romance between a gangster's widow and a businessman.

programme.title: The Embezzler
programme.desc: A quiet, respectable, henpecked bank cashier learns that he has only a few years left to live. He decides to embezzle money from the bank where he works and enjoy the rest of his days in South America.

programme.title: The Hideout
programme.desc: An insurance investigator has a chance encounter with the sister of a fur dealer and soon finds himself embroiled in intrigue involving a case filled with cash as well as a potential outbreak of anthrax.

programme.title: Cottage to Let
programme.desc: Nazis try to learn the plans and location of a secret bomb sight in Scotland from an Allied scientist.

programme.title: Blackmail
programme.desc: A Scotland Yard inspector deals with a blackmailer who knows that the lawman's fiancee killed an artist.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Mind of Simon Foster
programme.desc: In an impoverished future, Simon Foster goes to a pawnshop to sell some personal items to raise money for rent. The shop owner offers to buy some of his memories. In Simon Foster's life, what could be possibly be valuable?

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Wall
programme.desc: A U.S. military experiment opens a portal to an unknown place. After sending through one team, the Army calls upon a career soldier to investigate, where he finds an idyllic planet. He has to decide whether to stay or go back to his old life.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Cat and Mouse
programme.desc: A shy woman finds that a cat is actually a cursed "Casanova." She falls for the man but finds that her Prince Charming is actually a scoundrel.

programme.title: Rendezvous in a Dark Place
programme.desc: An old woman with an obsession with death attends funerals for entertainment. One night when an injured thief breaks into her home, she lets him die and waits for Death to come and collect him.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Many, Many Monkeys
programme.desc: An epidemic breaks out and many people are struck blind. Something more happens, however: People have become cold and heartless toward each other.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Love Is Blind
programme.desc: A man plotting to murder his wife's lover meets a blind singer who seems to know all about his plans.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Crazy as a Soup Sandwich
programme.desc: A man sells his soul to a demon for some racing tips. After being terrified by the demon he goes for help from the criminal boss he borrowed the track money from.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Special Service
programme.desc: A man finds that his life has been on TV for the past five years.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Wong's Lost and Found Emporium
programme.desc: David Wong searches for something he lost. He seeks the Lost and Found Emporium where he finds others looking for their lost items.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Irish Crown Affair
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Dublin, Ireland in search of the missing crown of the last King of Ireland.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Nothing But the Truth
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are reunited with Stewie Harper in the search for the Chalice of Truth in France.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to Paris, France after the Sword of Jacques de Molay, Grand Master of the Knights Templar. Rival relic hunter Rita Rosellini is also after the sword.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Possessed
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are in Brussels, Belgium in search of the sacred sundial of Zeus in order to stop the Vampires.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Memories of Montmartre
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Paris, France to find a stolen locket, so they can clear Sydney's dead grandmother of the charges.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Put Back
programme.desc: Kuba, Africa 100 AD: Worshippers of Woote curse his idol to protect it. 2000: Ross Crawford comes to Sydney, because he took the idol and the curse has accelerated his aging.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Legend of the Lost
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel set out to find if the legend of the lost civilization in New Guinea is actually true. Unfortunately, they have to team up with Derek Lloyd.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Dagger of Death
programme.desc: India, 500 A.D.: A precious dagger is used in human sacrifices to goddess Kali. Sydney must return a relic to India for her fellow hunter, who believes the dagger made him kill his assistant.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fugue
programme.desc: FBI Agent Abby Corrigan's life is endangered after she is suddenly attacked by an unfamiliar abnormal during an investigation. Magnus and Will's heated debate over the best way to help Abby threatens to permanently alter their relationship.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Chimera
programme.desc: There is a sentient organic nanite causing havoc in the computer system in the Sanctuary. Magnus and Tesla connect their minds to the system in an effort to isolate the nanite. They find Adam Worth instead.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Acolyte
programme.desc: A radical group of abnormal beings plan a terrorist attack with the goal of starting a war between surface dwellers and hollow Earth inhabitants. To Magnus' disbelief, Addison, at the NSA, has proof of Biggie's leadership of the group.

programme.title: Sanctuary: The Depths
programme.desc: When Magnus and Will learn of a plan to capture very rare and dangerous Abnormal, they travel to a remote cave to prevent then hunt.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The Big Plot
programme.desc: Found among the wreckage of a crashed plane are parts of an atomic bomb and Peter uncovers a plot to start a Third World War.

programme.title: The Lost World: Tourist Season
programme.desc: Challenger builds a windmill. But when his generator is struck by lightning, a portal is opened that ushers in a helicopter carrying a family of tourists from the year 2000.

programme.title: The Lost World: Skin Deep
programme.desc: When Marguerite begins acting uncharacteristically nice, the group raises some questions. A stumbling dinosaur in the jungle holds the answer: an alien life force has begun controlling their bodies.

programme.title: The Lost World: London Calling
programme.desc: Nelson discovers a map that shows a way off the plateau, but he has doubts about leaving. The group has to outrun nomads as they follow the route out of the Lost Word.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team struggles to disempower a military colonel who has threatened to unleash a nuclear holocaust.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Ashlocke goes back in time to try and make himself invincible by giving something to his the younger self, prompting Brennan and Shalimar to follow him.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team heads into the wilderness to track down a killer beast which is targeting hikers.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Ashlocke is desperate to find a cure for his fatal condition and infiltrates the Sanctuary to blackmail Adam into getting hold of the antidote.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A military plane is shot down behind enemy lines, prompting the team to make a desperate bid to recover the secret government weapon hidden on board.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team sets out to save Brennan, who has become trapped inside an invisible town and is facing execution for a crime he didn't commit.
